Tucson could feel that she too was a bit like himself.  Unsure of things, w=
ondering if these expressions of feelings were real, instead of just some c=
heap side effect from an infusion of venom.  At first he too, is lost for w=
ords, as shyness creeps in somewhat.  Yet his expression remains the same, =
with a smile on his face.  He didn't believe in showing off as other bots m=
ay have done to impress a femme bot.  He believed in being sincere, and him=
self. 

" Thanks for - being right there with me Talon.  You - were a big h=
elp."  

It wasn't much but he knew he made one small step to building a re=
lationship.
